title: Upholstery of Sofa Set
description: Tender notice for upholstery work of sofa set at the Directorate of Tourism, Kashmir. Interested service providers with experience in furniture upholstery and valid credentials are invited to submit their bids.

title: Repair and Maintenance of Air Conditioners
description: Dasti quotation for repair and maintenance of Air Conditioners at various tourism department offices and facilities. Interested service providers with experience in AC repair and valid credentials are invited to submit their quotations.

title: Procurement of Various Items
description: Tender notice for procurement of various items required for tourism operations and facilities at the Directorate of Tourism, Kashmir. Interested suppliers with valid credentials and GST registration are invited to submit their bids.

title: Washing and Dry Cleaning of Curtains
description: Tender notice for washing and dry cleaning services for curtains and furnishings at tourism department offices and facilities. Interested service providers with experience in institutional laundry services are invited to submit their bids.

title: Entry and Mid Level Laptop - Notebook (Q2) , Tablet Computer (V2) (Q2)
description: Consolidated bid document for procurement through Government e-Marketplace (GeM) portal covering multiple categories of goods and services required by the Directorate of Tourism, Kashmir. Registered GeM vendors are invited to submit their bids.

title: Printing of Tourism Brochures
description: Tender notice for printing of high-quality tourism brochures for the Directorate of Tourism, Kashmir. Interested printing presses/vendors with valid credentials and experience in high-quality offset printing are invited to submit their bids.

title: Procurement of Snow Mobiles
description: Tender notice for procurement of Snow Mobiles for winter adventure tourism activities in Kashmir. Interested manufacturers/suppliers with valid credentials and experience in supply of snow mobiles are invited to submit their bids.

title: Supply of Ski Equipment, Safety Gear & Uniforms
description: Tender notice for supply of Ski Equipment, Safety Gear and Uniforms to the Directorate of Tourism, Kashmir. Interested suppliers with valid credentials are invited to submit their bids.

title: Supply of High Quality Skiing & Trekking Equipment
description: Tender notice for supply of High Quality Skiing & Trekking Equipment to the Directorate of Tourism, Kashmir. Interested suppliers with valid credentials are invited to submit their bids.
